column5: Retreat for one or two guests--couple, buddies or business travelers. Street parking. Private entrance. Two single beds. Private bathroom. Refrigerator, microwave, electric kettle, table and chairs. Tea, coffee, water, fruit, breakfast bars, snacks and popcorn.  Our Mahncke Park neighborhood is walking distance to botanical garden, restaurants, museum, parks, zoo. Good public transportation. Close to Pearl and downtown. We have dogs & cats who don't allow other animals to visit. (Sorry!)
column8: Large upstairs guestroom, private bath& entrance
